attributes.action: introduce a law criminalising the use of the British Flag as part of a political groups emblem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Flag, and the individual flags of the nations that comprise of Great Britain, are the symbols of our unity. Its the symbol which should be used when we speak as one voice, move as one force and act as one being. It should not be used by something that divides us. Political parties, do not represent our nation, they represent groups of people within our nation and therefore should not be allowed to use the symbol of our Unity when all they are doing is dividing us.
